name: Pocket Ninja
description:
Pocket Ninja is a simple 2D shooting game. It revolves around the life of ‘a young ninja

prodigy seeking revenge to the Orc that destroyed their peaceful village. He is on his way to

take down the evil Orc. He declares war through his ninja way, by the means shooting

shuriken. The ninja needs to strategically clear the path of the ninja in order for him to finally

fight the Orc. It is time to defeat the Orcs and give justice that Ninja’s homeland.

Shoot justice for the sake of Ninja’s spirit!
